author: andreas
content: Thanks. Ahh, the Lensbaby! One of my least used lenses by now. But you're right, these images work well with the Lensbaby, especially with out-of-focus lights near the edge. Maybe I should use it a little more often, it's only that I am completely in love with that new Tamron. Stabilization of a fast lens, that's absolutely great ðŸ™‚
